name: taskmanagerwebapp
description: The Task Manager Web App is a system designed for managing tasks efficiently within an organization. It supports user roles, authentication, task creation, assignment, and workflow management, with optional enhancements for advanced functionality.

scripts.client: cd task-manager-frontend && set PORT=3001 && npm start
